title: The Smeezingtons
summary: The Smeezingtons were an American songwriting and record production team consisting of Bruno Mars (born 1985), Philip Lawrence (born 1980), and Ari Levine (born May 5, 1984).[1][2] The Smeezingtons were established in Los Angeles, California; their production and writing services had been increasingly in demand since 2009.[3] Eventually, the trio split, and with Christopher Brody Brown, Mars and Lawrence formed a new production trio called "Shampoo Press & Curl".
